short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension add another 2 free member-only stories for you on the medium.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension help to overcome the restrictions of medium to read the two stories a month. If you run out of stories just click on the extension it would add another 2 stories to your account. One more good news is this extension doesn't capture any userinformation.
